name: RoboControl
description:
In RoboControl the robot on screen can be controlled while you or another player can use the mouse to manipulate the environment with switches and dials.

This game can be played either single player or multiplayer.

How to play:

  • Platform to the end of the room to progress.
  • Use the switches and dials to make or move platforms.

Controls:

  • ←↓→ / ASD - movement
  • W/↑/space - jump
  • mouse - click on switches
  • F11 - fullscreen

Thanks for playing :D

music: https://freesound.org/people/eardeer/sounds/402955/

This game was made for the 2022 Brackeys game jam.
